info.name: Common Popbill Statement API
info.description:
When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer authentication is stored in the variable of Collection Scope.


So, You must always call GetToken to test the API.

exec: * GetToken is a sample code that issues a Bearer token to be entered in
* the Authentication header when calling the POPBiLL API.
* (See the POPBILL API Certificate PDF Manual for more information)
// The LinkID and SecretKey are credentials and are changed to the values ​​provided by POPBiLL.
* The following code is that makes up the HMAC Message Digest
// Access_id is the Supplier's Business Registration Number (10 digits number except hyphen('-'))
// and the Scope array is a list of service codes that can be used for the issued token.
// (Scopes value - '12*' means Type of the e-Statement.)
//  └ 121 = Transaction details, 122 = Bill, 123 = Estimate, 124 = Purchase order, 125 = Deposit slip, 126 = Receipt
var Access_id = '1208184429'; // This is AppleKorea's Business Registration Number.
var TokenRequest = stringify({access_id : Access_id, scope : Scopes});
// Request headers for API Server HMAC authentication.

request.description: Request Token for POPBiLL API.

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
ㆍRegist and Issue the e-Statement. At the same time of issuance, points(fee) is charged and notification mail is sent to customer.

ㆍThe status of invoice is changed to 'Waiting for confirmation' when the result is returned successfully.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#RegistIssue

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ 121 = Transaction details, 122 = Bill, 123 = Estimate, 124 = Purchase order, 125 = Deposit slip, 126 = Receipt
// mgtKey to cancel the issued e-Statement

request.description:
ㆍCancel the e-Statement in the state of '승인대기(Waiting for confirmation)' or '발행완료(Issued)'. The status is changed to '취소(Canceled before issuance)' and '발행취소(Canceled after issuance)' each.

ㆍHow to reuse an statement ID of canceled e-Statement : Delete canceled e-Statement calling [1.4. Delete]API.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#Cancel

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ 121 = Transaction details, 122 = Bill, 123 = Estimate, 124 = Purchase order, 125 = Deposit slip, 126 = Receipt
// mgtKey to delete the cancled e-Statement

request.description:
ㆍDelete canceled e-Statement in deletable status. A statement ID of deleted e-Statement can be reused.

※ The deletable status : Canceled before issuance, Denied, Canceled after issuance

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#Delete

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ 121 = Transaction details, 122 = Bill, 123 = Estimate, 124 = Purchase order, 125 = Deposit slip, 126 = Receipt

request.description:
ㆍCheck the status of a single e-Statement and summarized information.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetInfo

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ 121 = Transaction details, 122 = Bill, 123 = Estimate, 124 = Purchase order, 125 = Deposit slip, 126 = Receipt
// List of mgtKey array to check the status (Maximum : 1000 invoices)

request.description:
ㆍCheck the status of bulk e-Statements and summarized information. (Maximum : 1000 statements)

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetInfos

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ 121 = Transaction details, 122 = Bill, 123 = Estimate, 124 = Purchase order, 125 = Deposit slip, 126 = Receipt
// mgtKey to check the detail e-Statement infomation

request.description:
ㆍCheck detailed information of a single e-Statement.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetDetailInfo

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.
// └ R = 등록일자, W = 작성일자, I = 발행일자
// [배열] 전자명세서 문서유형 : 121 / 122 / 123 / 124 / 125 / 126 중 선택 (다중 선택 가능)
// 	거래처 상호 / 사업자번호 중 검색하고자 하는 정보 입력
// {@no.2 DType} 값을 기준으로 하는 목록 정렬 방향 : "D" / "A" 중 택 1

request.description:
ㆍSearch e-Statements corresponded to the search criteria the user set.

ㆍDefault of optional fields is to 'search all'.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#Search

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍCheck the log of e-Statement's status change.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetLogs

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.
// └ TBOX = 임시 문서함, / SBOX = 매출 문서함

request.description:
ㆍGet the URL to access the page 'e-Statement list' on POPBiLL website in login status.

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetURL

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍGet the popup URL to view a single e-Statement on POPBiLL website.

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetPopUpURL

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍGet the popup URL to view a single e-Statement on POPBiLL website (showing a page without top, left menus and buttons)

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetViewURL

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍGet the popup URL to print a single e-Statement. User can select a print option - for supplier/customer/both.

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetPrintURL

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetEPrintURL

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍGet the popup URL to print e-Statements in bulk. (Maximum : 100 statements)

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetMassPrintURL

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍGet the popup URL of button located on bottom of a notification mail sent to customer. User can access the page to check e-Statement in detail.

ㆍThere is no valid time.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetMailURL

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍGet the popup URL to access POPBiLL website in login status.

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#GetAccessURL

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ 121 = Transaction details, 122 = Bill, 123 = Estimate, 124 = Purchase order, 125 = Deposit slip, 126 = Receipt

request.description:
ㆍResend a notification mail to customer. There's no minimum time required and no maximum number of calling API.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#SendEmail

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.
contents : 'test sms', // 메시지 내용, (*최대 90 byte까지 입력 가능, 초과한 내용은 자동으로 삭제되어 전송)

request.description:
ㆍSend a SMS(short message) to notify issuance of e-Statement and the fee is charged.

ㆍUser can check the result of sending SMS on POPBiLL website [문자·팩스(Messaging/FAX) -> 문자(Messaging) -> 전송내역(Sending log)]

ㆍSMS's capacity is 90byte and exceeded contents are truncated automatically. (Maximum of Korean letters : 45)

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#SendEmail

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍSend an e-Statement registered in POPBiLL and issued by fax and the fee is charged.

ㆍUser can check the result of sending fax on POPBiLL website [문자·팩스(Messaging/FAX) -> 팩스(FAX) -> 전송내역(Sending log)].

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#SendFAX

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍSend an e-Statement by fax without registration in POPBiLL. User can directly send a fax with the statement data stored in their system.

ㆍThe user can check the result of sending fax on POPBiLL website [문자·팩스(Messaging/FAX) -> 팩스(FAX) -> 전송내역(Sending log)].

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#FAXSend

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍAttach a statement issued through POPBiLL to the e-Statement.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#AttachStatement

exec: * GetToken을 실행하면 Bearer Token 인증에 사용되는 토큰이 Collection Scope 변수에 저장됩니다.

request.description:
ㆍDetach a statement issued through POPBiLL from the e-Statement.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/statement/java/api#DetachStatement
